Kayako - ticket id 60238295 // Ciprian Nastase commented publicly: Dear ADN,

Thank you for contacting GFI - Kerio Connect Support, I understand that a prospect customer is facing issues with the trial license they were issued:  10512-Z56RC-71G7M.

Please accept my sincere apologies for the delay in getting back to you; since the ticket was raised via email follow-up, it attained a low priority.

As previously indicated, the support team is unable to help with obtaining new licenses or adjusting any other license, and the correct avenue for solving this would be contacting the GFI Customer Care team here: https://customercare.gfi.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.

However, since we are talking about a trial license, the prospect customer can try obtaining a new trial, with an email address different from  daniel.fasshauer@tel-ka.de and try to see if the issue is solved with a new trial license. If the issue persists, please contact the GFI Customer Care team using the above URL.
 

Should you have further questions related to GFI - Kerio Connect, please do not hesitate to submit an additional support request and we will be happy to assist!

 

Please take a moment to tell us about your support experience; you'll be invited to our short survey in a separate email.

 

Best regards,

Ciprian Nastase

GFI - Kerio Connect Support Team
